channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Crabtree teams up with the prime suspect in the murder of a Chinese dignitary, in the hope of finding the true killer.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: Rosamund arrives at Downton following Edith's shocking departure; Edith's secret may be exposed to the family; Rose is delighted to introduce Atticus and his parents to Downton for the first time.
